data.title: South Central Denver — DARIA: Denver Art Review, Inquiry & Analysis
data.meta_site_name: DARIA: Denver Art Review, Inquiry & Analysis
data.text:
Another Gallery, 345 N Santa Fe Dr, Denver, CO 80223, 209-909-4822, Tue-Thu: 12-6pm, first and third Fri: 5:30-9:30pm, first Thu openings: 6-9pm, and by appt

Sep-Oct: Group Exhibition (curator: Ben Aitken)

Artists on Santa Fe Gallery, 747 Santa Fe Dr, Denver, CO 80204, 303-573-5903, Mon, Wed, Thu: 11am-3pm, Fri-Sat: 11am-5pm, Sun: 12-4pm, first and third Fri: 5-9pm

Aug 1-25: Amanda Stavast and Dmitri Valone: Entanglement (Main Gallery); Colorado Women's Art Museum Members Exhibition: I Belong in a Museum (Gallery East)

Sep 26-Oct 20: James Allan-Holmes: The Center Must Hold; Claire Ibarra: Passageways & Portals (Main Gallery); Jill Powers (Gallery East)

Denver’s Art District on Santa Fe, 858 Santa Fe Dr, Denver, CO 80204, 720-773-2373, open during events, first and third Fri: 6-9pm, and by appt
